content: Yeah. I think the other reasonable option for upstream to do is to offer a flag or installation option for whether one needs support for the older CPUs, perhaps defaulting to the widest support; I'm sure there are some users who don't need it.
@GervaisdeM you should be able to upgrade-zulip-from-git 6.x and have that work -- the only change since 6.2 is downgrading orjson for this issue.

I expect we'll do a 6.3 release with this change once it's been verified as working for you; I don't think we've made a firm decision on whether to include this downgrade in 7.0 as well; my hope is orjson upstream will just address the issue.

@Tim Abbott :heart:️

ᕦ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)ᕤ
Neat, orjson upstream agreed and switched back in 3.8.14.
GervaisdeM has marked this topic as resolved.
